title: Week 15 Matchups + Wheel of Shame, Kelce Goes Bananas - Fantasy Football Podcast for 12/17
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode to help you get a win in Week 15! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 15 matchup breakdowns and injury updates. Plus, a recap of the Chiefs vs Chargers game, and Jason spins the Wheel of Shame during the “Fantasy Faceoff” segment! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for December 17th, 2021.
 (02:00) - Thursday Night Recap: Chiefs at Chargers
 (08:25) - FootClan Friday
 (09:15) - NFL News
 (21:45) - Fantasy Forecast 
 (24:20) - Titans @ Steelers
 (29:30) - Texans @ Jaguars
 (35:00) - Bengals @ Broncos
 (38:35) - Falcons @ 49ers
 (47:25) - Seahawks @ Rams
 (52:50) - Packers @ Ravens
 (59:00) - Saints @ Buccaneers
 (01:02:10) - Vikings @ Bears
 (01:05:40) - Fantasy Faceoff & Wheel of Shame
